name: Daruvair
description: The Beta of my RPG Maker MV game. I will update this at minimum once a month. You don't have to donate to me at all. I'm just having fun doing this. A majority of the assets are not mine, but as far as characters go, I am going to go through little by little and replace them with my own art. This game is your basic fantasy story that is a basically a playable copy of a Roleplay story that I am making with one of my lovely friends.
